item.title: Flowback Methods in the Permian
item.description: Methodology Analyze completion filings obtained from NMOCD to gain a better understanding of flowback strategies by our peers. Operators included in the dataset are Concho, Centennial, Devon, EOG, Matador, Mewbourne and Oxy. Completion data is from 2017-Current. Highlights Many of our peers are flowing up casingâ€¦not just EOG.
